oracle.kubernetes.operator

Class DomainStatusUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.kubernetes.operator.DomainStatusUpdater

  • public class DomainStatusUpdater
extends Object
    Updates for status of Domain. This class has two modes: 1) Watching for Pod state changes by listening to events from PodWatcher and 2) Factory for Steps that the main processing flow can use to explicitly set the condition to Progressing or Failed.
